## Airport CAN


```{r , echo=FALSE}

library(leaflet)

YOW_2see <- data.frame(name=c("Unversity", "Parliement", "Musuem"), rating = c( 1, 2, 3), 
                         lat=c(45.4231, 45.4236, 45.4171), 
                         lng=c(-75.6831, -75.7009, -75.7169))
my_map <- YOW_2see  %>% leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% 
  addCircles(weight=15, radius=( YOW_2see$rating)*25)

my_map 


```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
